subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tennessee tailback LaMarcus Coker and defensive tackle Demonte Bolden will miss Saturday’s game against Louisiana-Lafayette because of a violation of team rules. Bolden is a starter; Coker is a backup who returns kicks. Coach Phillip Fulmer would not elaborate on the violation.
